reducedMembers.name: Ran Neu-Ner
reducedMembers.description: Founded The Creative Counsel in 2001, South Africa's leading activations agency with an annual turnover of $150 million. Joined the Young Presidents Organisation 2010, a global network of successful CEO’s, sharing learnings and ideas exchange where he is still an active member. He has also taken on an EXCO role for the Johannesburg City Chapter. In 2015 Ran concluded the biggest business transaction in South Africa where he sold The Creative Counsel to a French-owned international business, The Publicis Groupe for just over $150m Ran has been a part of the Blockchain world since 2013 and has advised several projects. He is the founder of Onchain Capital, a Crypto Asset Fund and Advisory service. In 2017 Ran’s launched the world’s first televised cryptocurrency show called Crypto Trader which is aired weekly on a Thursday night at 20:30 on CNBC Africa, DSTV channel 410. The show is the most viewed show on CNBC today. Ran is also ranked in the top 10 most influential people in the Blockchain by Richtopia.

reducedMembers.name: Henok "Hen" Tekle
reducedMembers.description: Co-founder and Managing Partner of AlphaChain, a notable blockchain angel investor, advisor, content creator and public speaker. Hen is a passionate advocate for the disruption brought by token economies and blockchain technology, and regularly speaks at conferences worldwide about these topics. Hen’s angel investment activities have delivered substantial capital and strategic value to early-stage companies in promotion of the development and mainstream adoption of blockchain technology.

reducedMembers.name: Mikhail Sayfullin
reducedMembers.description: Entrepreneur since 2002. Founded and developed a marketing agency that successfully delivered high quality services to the largest international corporations. Since 2014, Michail has been successfully working in the IT field launching a popular marketplace in the entertainment sector. One of the founders of the Enecuum Limited and our strategic manager since 2017.

reducedMembers.name: Jev Vainsteins
reducedMembers.description: BD Exec Cloud Evangelist, Blockchain Enthusiast, ICO & VC Advisor. 16-years experience in technical marketing (Business Development, Sales & Presales to Carriers, Distributors, VAR's, System Integrators). Indirect Channel development for Telecom Products within CEE/CIS and EMEA. Establish new relationships with Distributors, System integrators, Service providers and Solution Partners within CEE/CIS and EMEA. Strong relationships with decision makers in the data centre, cloud and telecommunications sectors within EMEA.Jev is perfect visioner and speaker https://youtu.be/PWo0W9vdc-U. Responsible for business development of ENQ platform. Ex Huawei IT Solutions Sales Executive Responsible for Cloud in EMEA Global Solution Elite Team. Canonical Ubuntu Business Development Executive responsible for Partner Programs and Sales EMEA & APAC. Ex Senior Sales Engineering Leader in Cogent Communications 3rd largest ISP provider in the world carrying over 20% of World internet traffic present in 2500 data centers, having its own 53 data centers and having one of the largest fiber network in the world.

reducedMembers.name: Jason Yee
reducedMembers.description: Finance head with over 20 years of experience providing strategic guidance, quality reporting, insights and leadership for some of the largest multinational banks including BNP Paribas and JPMorgan.  Professionally qualified as a CPA with a MBA degree from the University of Toronto, Jason is thrilled to join the Enecuum team to make a difference.

reducedMembers.name: Jorge Sebastiao
reducedMembers.description: CTO Eco-System in Huawei Technologies. Over 30 years of ICT experience, covering, managed services, cyber security, innovation, architecture as well as risk management, compliance, auditing, certification, business continuity, & disaster recovery. He was become infected by Enecuum technological steck.

reducedMembers.name: Ivan V. Ivanov
reducedMembers.description: Founder of the UPSTUDY GROUP, co-Founder of EE24.COM, managing director of the YUKUMA GROUP. A prominent professional with more than 13 years experience of business development and management in High Tech, IT and Web projects. With his strong entrepreneurial skills and multiple international business connections, Ivan is proud to be a board member of Enecuum helping make the project an international success.

reducedMembers.name: Shelly Hod Moyal
reducedMembers.description: Shelly Hod Moyal is an Advisor to iCapital, Portfolio Manager of Juno Capital and Founding Partner of iAngels, a VC platform for high-tech startups, with $140M assets under management in divisions and funds that specialize in several tech industry sectors. Prior to iAngels, Shelly was recognized as a promising analyst at Goldman Sachs Investment Bank. Prior to that, Shelly worked as a Research Analyst at a renowned hedge fund, Avenue Capital, covering banks, insurance, real estate and financial institutions. Shelly earned her MBA at Kellogg, Chicago and holds a degree in Economics (summa cum laude) at Hunter College, New York.

reducedMembers.name: Lana Lyu
reducedMembers.description: Lana is a Blockchain Technology aficionado with extensive experience working in the legal, financial and DLT related services sector for German, Russian, Kazakh and Hong Kong private and corporate clients. Passionate about FinTech Startups/SME's and female entrepreneurship, Lana supports the development and growth of FinTech community in Hong Kong, regularly delivers talks on the conferences and universities, organizes monthly events with & for Women in Business. Lana leads Russian Club Hong Kong as Vice President developing the Russian-Hong Kong social and business relationship.

reducedMembers.name: Stan Prihodko
reducedMembers.description: Stan is head of Crypto asset management in GEM Capital, a fund with over $400m AUM. Prior to joining GEM Stan was engaged in trust management of cryptocurrency assets and consultations on investing in ICOs for high net worth individuals.

reducedMembers.name: Tarun Jaswani
reducedMembers.description: Tarun Jaswani is partner with Interfacemax, a Digital Asset Fund focussed on blockchain projects that create value through real world application. A techpreneur with past experience in Virtual Reality, Gaming and Adtech.

reducedMembers.name: Bezzateev Sergey
reducedMembers.position: Professor, Doctor of Science in Cryptography
reducedMembers.description: Sc.D. in CS, head of the Department of IT Security of the Saint Petersburg State University of Aerospace Instrumentation. Sergey is renown specialist with over 40 materials published in the field of Information Theory, Coding Theory, InfoSec, and one of the leading experts in cryptography.

reducedMembers.name: Amanda Hung
reducedMembers.description: Amanda believes that a good accountant is not only capable of dealing with financial affairs of the company, but also finds ways to improve one’s efficiency and performance. Integrity, clear mind and efficiency are the essential pillars of a professional accountant should possess. With more than 20 years of accounting experience in international companies, Amanda is proud to be a part of Enecuum team in Hong Kong.

reducedMembers.name: Adrian Guye
reducedMembers.description: General Counsel with 13 years of experience in London, Paris, Moscow and Hong Kong advising leading global financial institutions on a broad range of complex cross-border transactions, regulation and legal structuring. Previously with UBS, Barclays, Societe Generale, Credit Agricole and Citibank.

reducedMembers.name: Stefan Hamminga
reducedMembers.description: Stefan has fourteen years of experience in machine learning, artificial intelligence and robotics development. After his study Artificial Intelligence at the University of Groningen he went on to build a wide range of products, from business intelligence software to autonomous robotics. He is now very iterested in combining neural networking with blockchain technology.

Aleksandra received her M.Sc. in IT in 2003 and trained in the Nokia Research Center in Helsinki, Finland, on Evidence Based Security and Verification of Cryptographic Protocols. Aleksandra has participated in and led collaborative projects with Samsung, Intel, Dell EMC in InfoSec and Optimization of Resource Management Algorithms in Data Storage Systems.

Besides, he teaches computer science related courses at Saint-Petersburg State University of Airspace Instrumentation. 'To teach something is the best way to be sure that you really understand it'

members.name: Alexander Granin
members.description: Functional programming developer, researcher and writer'

members.description: Stefan has fourteen years of experience in machine learning, artificial intelligence and robotics development. After his study Artificial Intelligence at the University of Groningen he went on to build a wide range of products, from business intelligence software to autonomous robotics. members.name: Sergey Vanurin
members.description: IT specialist with background in development, support, DevOps and delivery. As a project manager Sergey developed online 3D geoinformation system with successful adoption in city planning department. Interested in mathematics and data science Sergey finds Enecuum as the perfect place for personal growth and the world changing.

members.name: Ivan Zhuravlev
members.description: Ivan has over 15 years background in Software Development. Since 2008, he's also been outsourcing numerous projects, including team assembly process, release planning, and project management. Ivan is a CTO, and is also an InfoSec researcher and developer of highload and decentralized systems.

members.name: Kseniya Pozdnyakova
members.description: Ksenia is a Haskell developer, her favourite programming language. "Haskell is so natural for someone who really loves math". She has a strong background in Applied Mathematics received at the Ural Federal University. She dreams of changing the world. That is why she chose to be a developer. "You can invent something and scale it for the whole of humankind. You can improve life drastically not only for a single person, but for the whole society. That is my passion," says Ksenia.

members.name: Darya Melnikova
members.description: A Haskell/C++ software developer, Daria is stuyding for a Master's degree in Computer Science & Software Engineering. Her passion is mathematical logic and functional programming. Daria also has an Advanced Training Diploma from the Saint Petersburg Academic University and a law degree. After a few years of building a career in law, Daria discovered that software development is much more fun, than legislations and contracts, and was into it ever since.

members.name: Mikhail Gluhov
members.description: Mike loves to solve complex problems. An effective Tech Lead establishes a technical vision with the development team and works with developers to turn it into reality. Mike takes on traits that other roles may have, such as a Team Lead, Architect or Software Engineering Manager but they remain hands-on with code.

members.name: Oleg Karakoz
members.description: Oleg is a Technical Writer with a passion for new concepts. He has knowledge of several European languages and likes English for its universal application and professional versatility. He received a B.A. in Linguistics, but is now interested in CS and is learning Java.

members.name: Dmitry Pavlyuk
members.description: A developer-mathematician, Dmitry specializes in functional programming languages. He studied at the Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics faculty of the Lomonosov Moscow State University. He has a hands-on work experience in VPN-client development.

members.name: Dmitry Korobenko
members.description: Dmitry spent several years working as а cameraman, film editor and technical specialist in a non-profit educational organization but decided to dive into IT and technology. Nevertheless he strongly believes that human nature is the most interesting and complicated information system.

members.name: Dmitry Rumyantsev
members.description: Dmitry is a PR specialist with more than 7 years experience in IT, education, crypto and politics spheres. He is not only responsible for PR support, he is a great journalist and passionate person who believes that Enecuum become successful prpject and will change the world.

members.name: Alisa Kosykh
members.description: Has an experience as SMM manager in several blockchain projects. Works in Enecuum with social networks and freshest information about the project. Got a bachelor degree  in advertisement and public relations. Speaks 4 languages - Russian, English, French and Italian. Wants to get to the social networks on a new level.

members.name: Lera Vinokurova
members.description: Lera used to work in a Charity and knows better than anyone how important it is to build a communicational bridge between people. She provides support and troubleshooting for a strong partner relationship with the customer to better serve their business needs.

members.name: Pinxuan Wu
members.description: Xuan used to work in mass media of the biggest Chinese e-commerce platform Taobao. With years interacting with customers she knows how to grab their wants and needs immediately even better than themselves. After that she switching into another social media Facebook, Instagram, Youtube. Having been in PR position, she learned how to represent company’s goal, pursuing and attitude towards it’s clients. Hundreds and thousands times tracing audience likes, makes her most familiar thing is delivering feedback back to corresponding department. She is 24 hours ready here to help participants’  problems.

members.name: Alexandr Tsybiskin
members.description: Alexander has a lot of experience with different blockchain systems, exchanges and wallets. His previous position as tech support for ISP made him skilled in providing customer support and troubleshooting.

members.name: Julia Krutikova
members.description: Julia is a business assistant at Enecuum. Having over 16 years of professional administrative experience in different spheres of business, she is sure that administrative efficiency and streamlined workflow are the background of each successful project.
